sentences.en: A CD-ROM can store more than 250,000 pages of typed text.
sentences.cn: 一张只读光盘能存储25万多页键入的文本。

sentences.en: a store of wood
sentences.cn: 木料储备

sentences.en: At Christmas the stores stay open late.
sentences.cn: 在圣诞节期间，商店营业到很晚。

sentences.en: Be sure to store them carefully as they bruise easily.
sentences.cn: 小心存放，因为它们很容易被碰伤。

sentences.en: Customers know that our stocktake sales offer genuine markdowns across the store.
sentences.cn: 顾客们知道我们的清仓大甩卖是实实在在的全场降价。

sentences.en: great trouble in store for her.
sentences.cn: 她的即将来临的大烦恼

sentences.en: Jim Coulters will mind the store while I'm away.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候吉姆·库尔特斯会照看店铺的。

sentences.en: many people set much store by privacy.
sentences.cn: 许多人非常重视个人隐私。

sentences.en: Most store managers have worked their way up through the ranks.
sentences.cn: 大多数商店经理都是由普通店员干起，一步步升上来的。

sentences.en: My boyfriend and I robbed a store and were caught red-handed.
sentences.cn: 我和男朋友去抢劫一家商店，被当场逮到了。

sentences.en: She hurried to the kitchen in back of the store.
sentences.cn: 她赶紧进到商店后面的厨房。

sentences.en: She planned to unlock the store at 8.00 sharp this morning.
sentences.cn: 她打算今天早上8点整准时开门营业。

sentences.en: Store grains and cereals in a cool, dry place.
sentences.cn: 将粮食和谷物储存在阴凉干燥的地方。

sentences.en: Store the beans in an airtight jar.
sentences.cn: 把豆子贮存在密封罐内。

sentences.en: Store the cookies in an airtight tin.
sentences.cn: 把曲奇饼干存放在一个密封罐中。

sentences.en: The most popular items are located toward the back of the store.
sentences.cn: 最受欢迎的产品放在靠近商店最里面的地方。

sentences.en: The owners of the store have stepped up customer mailings.
sentences.cn: 店主们加大了对顾客的邮寄宣传力度。

sentences.en: They had to buy everything at inflated prices at the ranch store.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不在农场商店以高价购买所有东西。

sentences.en: They wandered off in the direction of the nearest store.
sentences.cn: 他们信步朝最近的商店走去。

sentences.en: Who knows what lies in store for the President?
sentences.cn: 谁知道总统将要面临什么？

sentences.en: You can store your entire CD collection on the computer's hard drive.
sentences.cn: 你可以将收藏的全部CD保存在电脑硬盘上。

words.tran_cn: 店主；仓库管理员；零售店店主

phrases.tran_cn: 储藏备用；准备着，储藏着

phrases.phrase: set (或 lay, put) store by (或 on)

trans.tran_en: a place where goods are sold to the public. In British English, a store is large and sells many different things, but in American English, a store can be large or small, and sell many things or only one type of thing.
to put things away and keep them until you need them

trans.tran_cn: 储藏， 储备， 存储
trans.tran_en: When you store things, you put them in a container or other place and leave them there until they are needed
